creator: foreverdisturbed
title: BB Gun Spray Paint Can Art
description: This project involves shooting old spray paint cans with a BB gun to create art on a stretched canvas. When the cans are hit, they spray paint onto the canvas, creating a unique and potentially messy art piece.
steps: Place a stretched canvas in a safe outdoor area.
Position the old spray paint cans in front of the canvas.
From a distance of 15-20 feet, shoot the spray paint cans with a BB gun.
The impact will cause the cans to spray paint onto the canvas.
Continue shooting until the desired effect is achieved. Ensure no animals are harmed.
Allow the paint to dry completely.
